QuestData.Title: Surveying Secrets
QuestData.Description:
Each of the covenants have provided their own specialists in their areas of expertise. A few of them have taken to the field to scout this unknown land.
Speak with them. They should all be keeping a report of their survey. Return them to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the forward scouts in Korthia.
QuestData.RewardText: Most of this information is useful. My thanks, Maw Walker.
